mapper.select: SELECT to_char(c.writedate,'YYYY-MM-DD') as writedate,C.* FROM (SELECT ROWNUM row_num,r.* from (select * from inquire where otherid=#{otherid}) r ) c where row_num >= #{paging.startNum} and row_num <= #{paging.endNum}

SELECT to_char(c.writedate,'YYYY-MM-DD') as writedate,C.* FROM (SELECT ROWNUM row_num,r.* from (select * from inquire where id=#{id}) r ) c where row_num >= #{paging.startNum} and row_num <= #{paging.endNum}
select count(*) from inquire where otherid=#{otherid}
select count(*) from inquire where id=#{id}
mapper.update: update inquire set read='Y' where ino=#{ino}
mapper.select: SELECT C.* FROM (SELECT ROWNUM row_num,r.* from (select * from report) r ) c where row_num >= #{paging.startNum} and row_num <= #{paging.endNum}
SELECT C.* FROM (SELECT ROWNUM row_num,r.* from (select * from report where id=#{id}) r ) c where row_num >= #{paging.startNum} and row_num <= #{paging.endNum}
select count(*) from report where id=#{id}
select * from report where repno=#{repno} and id=#{id}
mapper.update: update report set read='Y' where repno=#{repno} and id=#{id}
update report set title=#{title},contents=#{contents},rfile=#{rfile},rfileoriname=#{rfileoriname},writedate=to_char(sysdate,'YYYY.MM.DD'),read='N',acceptreport='N' where repno=#{repno} and id=#{id}
mapper.delete: delete from report where repno=#{repno} and id=#{id}
mapper.update: update report set acceptreport = 'Y' where repno=#{repno} and otherid=#{otherid}
